title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4500.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4500.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, unless the context otherwise
requires: (a) Development plan means
the general development plan, as heretofore or hereafter amended, annexed as

Schedule 2 to the lease, dated December 23, 1969, as heretofore or hereafter
amended, among the City of New York, the New York State Urban Development

Corporation and the Roosevelt Island Development Corporation, pursuant to which
the City of New York leased substantially all of Roosevelt Island to the New

York State Urban Development Corporation. (b) Representative means director, officer or
employee. (c) RIOC means the

Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation created by section 3 of chapter 899 of
the Laws of 1984. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4500.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
